description: Seul. (Alone) is a text based choose your own adventure and philosophical thriller with horror elements. A subsistence where characters dwell. There are mysteries to solve and connections to unfold. Journey through here but remember you may not stay. Can you save Peggy?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: CPU 1 Ghz or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Any Sound Card
